name: Vapor - Wireframe library (Demo)
description:
Vapor is a wireframe library for those who don't want to build wireframes from scratch. We provide the building blocks for wireframing your next idea so that you design better and faster. Vapor provides multipurpose components such that one component can be used for numerous variations with different features making Vapor, one of the lightest yet extensive wireframe library you can find.


Built for your team on Figma.


Need building blocks for your next design system? Check out Moleculed
